item.title: Manus DevTools
item.description: DevTools came out of the necessity of having a way to configure models in the new Skeleton based animation system that we were developing.

item.description: This project started with an interaction with one of the game developers that I follow on twitter.

item.description: This project came from an idea that I’ve been exploring for a while, “What is like to have super powers in VR?
